attributes.action: Rescind all honours awarded to bankers and related financial managers in the last 15 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the anti-social behaviour of senior bankers in the UK in the last 15-20 years the State should show its displeasure by rescinding and withdrawing all honours bestowed on individuals for their services either to banking or to financial services generally. Altruism rather than individual greed and social fear should be the guiding principles behind the award of all honours in the future.
